      [245] "<script id=\"quarto-html-after-body\" type=\"application/javascript\">"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [246] "window.document.addEventListener(\"DOMContentLoaded\", function (event) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [247] "  const toggleBodyColorMode = (bsSheetEl) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [248] "    const mode = bsSheetEl.getAttribute(\"data-mode\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [249] "    const bodyEl = window.document.querySelector(\"body\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [250] "    if (mode === \"dark\") {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [251] "      bodyEl.classList.add(\"quarto-dark\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [252] "      bodyEl.classList.remove(\"quarto-light\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [253] "    } else {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [254] "      bodyEl.classList.add(\"quarto-light\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [255] "      bodyEl.classList.remove(\"quarto-dark\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [256] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [257] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [258] "  const toggleBodyColorPrimary = () => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [259] "    const bsSheetEl = window.document.querySelector(\"link#quarto-bootstrap\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [260] "    if (bsSheetEl) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [261] "      toggleBodyColorMode(bsSheetEl);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [262] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [263] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [264] "  toggleBodyColorPrimary();  "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [265] "  const icon = \"\";"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [266] "  const anchorJS = new window.AnchorJS();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [267] "  anchorJS.options = {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [268] "    placement: 'right',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [269] "    icon: icon"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [270] "  };"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [271] "  anchorJS.add('.anchored');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [272] "  const isCodeAnnotation = (el) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [273] "    for (const clz of el.classList) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [274] "      if (clz.startsWith('code-annotation-')) {                     "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [275] "        return true;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [276] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [277] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [278] "    return false;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [279] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [280] "  const clipboard = new window.ClipboardJS('.code-copy-button', {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [281] "    text: function(trigger) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [282] "      const codeEl = trigger.previousElementSibling.cloneNode(true);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [283] "      for (const childEl of codeEl.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [284] "        if (isCodeAnnotation(childEl)) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [285] "          childEl.remove();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [286] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [287] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [288] "      return codeEl.innerText;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [289] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [290] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [291] "  clipboard.on('success', function(e) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [292] "    // button target"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [293] "    const button = e.trigger;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [294] "    // don't keep focus"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [295] "    button.blur();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [296] "    // flash \"checked\""                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [297] "    button.classList.add('code-copy-button-checked');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [298] "    var currentTitle = button.getAttribute(\"title\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [299] "    button.setAttribute(\"title\", \"Copied!\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [300] "    let tooltip;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [301] "    if (window.bootstrap) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [302] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-toggle\", \"tooltip\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [303] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-placement\", \"left\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [304] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-title\", \"Copied!\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [305] "      tooltip = new bootstrap.Tooltip(button, "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [306] "        { trigger: \"manual\", "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [307] "          customClass: \"code-copy-button-tooltip\","                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [308] "          offset: [0, -8]});"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [309] "      tooltip.show();    "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [310] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [311] "    setTimeout(function() {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [312] "      if (tooltip) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [313] "        tooltip.hide();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [314] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-title\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [315] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-toggle\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [316] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-placement\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [317] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [318] "      button.setAttribute(\"title\", currentTitle);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [319] "      button.classList.remove('code-copy-button-checked');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [320] "    }, 1000);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [321] "    // clear code selection"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [322] "    e.clearSelection();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [323] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [324] "  function tippyHover(el, contentFn, onTriggerFn, onUntriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [325] "    const config = {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [326] "      allowHTML: true,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [327] "      maxWidth: 500,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [328] "      delay: 100,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [329] "      arrow: false,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [330] "      appendTo: function(el) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [331] "          return el.parentElement;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [332] "      },"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [333] "      interactive: true,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [334] "      interactiveBorder: 10,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [335] "      theme: 'quarto',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [336] "      placement: 'bottom-start',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [337] "    };"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [338] "    if (contentFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [339] "      config.content = contentFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [340] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [341] "    if (onTriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [342] "      config.onTrigger = onTriggerFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [343] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [344] "    if (onUntriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [345] "      config.onUntrigger = onUntriggerFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [346] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [347] "    window.tippy(el, config); "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [348] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [349] "  const noterefs = window.document.querySelectorAll('a[role=\"doc-noteref\"]');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [350] "  for (var i=0; i<noterefs.length; i++) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [351] "    const ref = noterefs[i];"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [352] "    tippyHover(ref, function() {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [353] "      // use id or data attribute instead here"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [354] "      let href = ref.getAttribute('data-footnote-href') || ref.getAttribute('href');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [355] "      try { href = new URL(href).hash; } catch {}"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [356] "      const id = href.replace(/^#\\/?/, \"\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [357] "      const note = window.document.getElementById(id);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [358] "      return note.innerHTML;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [359] "    });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [360] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [361] "  const xrefs = window.document.querySelectorAll('a.quarto-xref');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [362] "  const processXRef = (id, note) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [363] "    // Strip column container classes"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [364] "    const stripColumnClz = (el) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [365] "      el.classList.remove(\"page-full\", \"page-columns\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [366] "      if (el.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [367] "        for (const child of el.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [368] "          stripColumnClz(child);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [369] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [370] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [371] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [372] "    stripColumnClz(note)"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [373] "    if (id.startsWith('sec-')) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [374] "      // Special case sections, only their first couple elements"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [375] "      const container = document.createElement(\"div\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [376] "      if (note.children && note.children.length > 2) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [377] "        for (let i = 0; i < 2; i++) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [378] "          container.appendChild(note.children[i].cloneNode(true));"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [379] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [380] "        return container.innerHTML"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [381] "      } else {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [382] "        return note.innerHTML;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [383] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [384] "    } else {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [385] "      // Remove any anchor links if they are present"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [386] "      const anchorLink = note.querySelector('a.anchorjs-link');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [387] "      if (anchorLink) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [388] "        anchorLink.remove();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [389] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [390] "      return note.innerHTML;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [391] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [392] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [393] "  for (var i=0; i<xrefs.length; i++) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [394] "    const xref = xrefs[i];"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [395] "    tippyHover(xref, undefined, function(instance) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [396] "      instance.disable();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [397] "      let url = xref.getAttribute('href');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [398] "      let hash = undefined; "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [399] "      if (url.startsWith('#')) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [400] "        hash = url;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [401] "      } else {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [402] "        try { hash = new URL(url).hash; } catch {}"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [403] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [404] "      if (hash) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [405] "        const id = hash.replace(/^#\\/?/, \"\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [406] "        const note = window.document.getElementById(id);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [407] "        if (note !== null) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [408] "          try {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [409] "            const html = processXRef(id, note.cloneNode(true));"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [410] "            instance.setContent(html);"

      [185] "<li><p>thanks <a href=\"https://github.com/JohnDoe\"><span class=\"citation\" data-cites=\"JohnDoe\">@JohnDoe</span></a>, <a href=\"https://github.com/JaneDoe\"><span class=\"citation\" data-cites=\"JaneDoe\">@JaneDoe</span></a></p></li>"
