      [193] "<script id=\"quarto-html-after-body\" type=\"application/javascript\">"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [194] "window.document.addEventListener(\"DOMContentLoaded\", function (event) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [195] "  const toggleBodyColorMode = (bsSheetEl) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [196] "    const mode = bsSheetEl.getAttribute(\"data-mode\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [197] "    const bodyEl = window.document.querySelector(\"body\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [198] "    if (mode === \"dark\") {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [199] "      bodyEl.classList.add(\"quarto-dark\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [200] "      bodyEl.classList.remove(\"quarto-light\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [201] "    } else {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [202] "      bodyEl.classList.add(\"quarto-light\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [203] "      bodyEl.classList.remove(\"quarto-dark\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [204] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [205] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [206] "  const toggleBodyColorPrimary = () => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [207] "    const bsSheetEl = window.document.querySelector(\"link#quarto-bootstrap\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [208] "    if (bsSheetEl) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [209] "      toggleBodyColorMode(bsSheetEl);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [210] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [211] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [212] "  toggleBodyColorPrimary();  "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [213] "  const icon = \"\";"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [214] "  const anchorJS = new window.AnchorJS();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [215] "  anchorJS.options = {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [216] "    placement: 'right',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [217] "    icon: icon"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [218] "  };"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [219] "  anchorJS.add('.anchored');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [220] "  const isCodeAnnotation = (el) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [221] "    for (const clz of el.classList) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [222] "      if (clz.startsWith('code-annotation-')) {                     "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [223] "        return true;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [224] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [225] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [226] "    return false;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [227] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [228] "  const clipboard = new window.ClipboardJS('.code-copy-button', {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [229] "    text: function(trigger) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [230] "      const codeEl = trigger.previousElementSibling.cloneNode(true);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [231] "      for (const childEl of codeEl.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [232] "        if (isCodeAnnotation(childEl)) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [233] "          childEl.remove();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [234] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [235] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [236] "      return codeEl.innerText;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [237] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [238] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [239] "  clipboard.on('success', function(e) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [240] "    // button target"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [241] "    const button = e.trigger;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [242] "    // don't keep focus"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [243] "    button.blur();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [244] "    // flash \"checked\""                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [245] "    button.classList.add('code-copy-button-checked');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [246] "    var currentTitle = button.getAttribute(\"title\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [247] "    button.setAttribute(\"title\", \"Copied!\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [248] "    let tooltip;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [249] "    if (window.bootstrap) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [250] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-toggle\", \"tooltip\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [251] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-placement\", \"left\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [252] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-title\", \"Copied!\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [253] "      tooltip = new bootstrap.Tooltip(button, "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [254] "        { trigger: \"manual\", "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [255] "          customClass: \"code-copy-button-tooltip\","                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [256] "          offset: [0, -8]});"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [257] "      tooltip.show();    "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [258] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [259] "    setTimeout(function() {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [260] "      if (tooltip) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [261] "        tooltip.hide();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [262] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-title\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [263] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-toggle\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [264] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-placement\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [265] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [266] "      button.setAttribute(\"title\", currentTitle);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [267] "      button.classList.remove('code-copy-button-checked');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [268] "    }, 1000);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [269] "    // clear code selection"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [270] "    e.clearSelection();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [271] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [272] "  function tippyHover(el, contentFn, onTriggerFn, onUntriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [273] "    const config = {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [274] "      allowHTML: true,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [275] "      maxWidth: 500,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [276] "      delay: 100,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [277] "      arrow: false,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [278] "      appendTo: function(el) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [279] "          return el.parentElement;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [280] "      },"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [281] "      interactive: true,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [282] "      interactiveBorder: 10,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [283] "      theme: 'quarto',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [284] "      placement: 'bottom-start',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [285] "    };"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [286] "    if (contentFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [287] "      config.content = contentFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [288] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [289] "    if (onTriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [290] "      config.onTrigger = onTriggerFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [291] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [292] "    if (onUntriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [293] "      config.onUntrigger = onUntriggerFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [294] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [295] "    window.tippy(el, config); "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [296] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [297] "  const noterefs = window.document.querySelectorAll('a[role=\"doc-noteref\"]');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [298] "  for (var i=0; i<noterefs.length; i++) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [299] "    const ref = noterefs[i];"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [300] "    tippyHover(ref, function() {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [301] "      // use id or data attribute instead here"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [302] "      let href = ref.getAttribute('data-footnote-href') || ref.getAttribute('href');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [303] "      try { href = new URL(href).hash; } catch {}"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [304] "      const id = href.replace(/^#\\/?/, \"\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [305] "      const note = window.document.getElementById(id);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [306] "      return note.innerHTML;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [307] "    });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [308] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [309] "  const xrefs = window.document.querySelectorAll('a.quarto-xref');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [310] "  const processXRef = (id, note) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [311] "    // Strip column container classes"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [312] "    const stripColumnClz = (el) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [313] "      el.classList.remove(\"page-full\", \"page-columns\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [314] "      if (el.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [315] "        for (const child of el.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [316] "          stripColumnClz(child);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [317] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [318] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [319] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [320] "    stripColumnClz(note)"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [321] "    if (id.startsWith('sec-')) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [322] "      // Special case sections, only their first couple elements"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [323] "      const container = document.createElement(\"div\");"

      [245] "<div class=\"sourceCode cell-code\" id=\"cb1\"><pre class=\"sourceCode r code-with-copy\"><code class=\"sourceCode r\"><span id=\"cb1-1\"><a href=\"#cb1-1\" aria-hidden=\"true\" tabindex=\"-1\"></a><span class=\"fu\">library</span>(testpkg.altdoc)</span>"

      [258] "<script id=\"quarto-html-after-body\" type=\"application/javascript\">"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [259] "window.document.addEventListener(\"DOMContentLoaded\", function (event) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [260] "  const toggleBodyColorMode = (bsSheetEl) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [261] "    const mode = bsSheetEl.getAttribute(\"data-mode\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [262] "    const bodyEl = window.document.querySelector(\"body\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [263] "    if (mode === \"dark\") {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [264] "      bodyEl.classList.add(\"quarto-dark\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [265] "      bodyEl.classList.remove(\"quarto-light\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [266] "    } else {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [267] "      bodyEl.classList.add(\"quarto-light\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [268] "      bodyEl.classList.remove(\"quarto-dark\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [269] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [270] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [271] "  const toggleBodyColorPrimary = () => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [272] "    const bsSheetEl = window.document.querySelector(\"link#quarto-bootstrap\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [273] "    if (bsSheetEl) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [274] "      toggleBodyColorMode(bsSheetEl);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [275] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [276] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [277] "  toggleBodyColorPrimary();  "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [278] "  const icon = \"\";"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [279] "  const anchorJS = new window.AnchorJS();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [280] "  anchorJS.options = {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [281] "    placement: 'right',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [282] "    icon: icon"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [283] "  };"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [284] "  anchorJS.add('.anchored');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [285] "  const isCodeAnnotation = (el) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [286] "    for (const clz of el.classList) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [287] "      if (clz.startsWith('code-annotation-')) {                     "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [288] "        return true;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [289] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [290] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [291] "    return false;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [292] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [293] "  const clipboard = new window.ClipboardJS('.code-copy-button', {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [294] "    text: function(trigger) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [295] "      const codeEl = trigger.previousElementSibling.cloneNode(true);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [296] "      for (const childEl of codeEl.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [297] "        if (isCodeAnnotation(childEl)) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [298] "          childEl.remove();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [299] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [300] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [301] "      return codeEl.innerText;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [302] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [303] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [304] "  clipboard.on('success', function(e) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [305] "    // button target"
