      [238] "<script id=\"quarto-html-after-body\" type=\"application/javascript\">"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [239] "window.document.addEventListener(\"DOMContentLoaded\", function (event) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [240] "  const toggleBodyColorMode = (bsSheetEl) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [241] "    const mode = bsSheetEl.getAttribute(\"data-mode\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [242] "    const bodyEl = window.document.querySelector(\"body\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [243] "    if (mode === \"dark\") {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [244] "      bodyEl.classList.add(\"quarto-dark\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [245] "      bodyEl.classList.remove(\"quarto-light\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [246] "    } else {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [247] "      bodyEl.classList.add(\"quarto-light\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [248] "      bodyEl.classList.remove(\"quarto-dark\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [249] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [250] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [251] "  const toggleBodyColorPrimary = () => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [252] "    const bsSheetEl = window.document.querySelector(\"link#quarto-bootstrap\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [253] "    if (bsSheetEl) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [254] "      toggleBodyColorMode(bsSheetEl);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [255] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [256] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [257] "  toggleBodyColorPrimary();  "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [258] "  const icon = \"\";"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [259] "  const anchorJS = new window.AnchorJS();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [260] "  anchorJS.options = {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [261] "    placement: 'right',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [262] "    icon: icon"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [263] "  };"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [264] "  anchorJS.add('.anchored');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [265] "  const isCodeAnnotation = (el) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [266] "    for (const clz of el.classList) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [267] "      if (clz.startsWith('code-annotation-')) {                     "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [268] "        return true;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [269] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [270] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [271] "    return false;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [272] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [273] "  const clipboard = new window.ClipboardJS('.code-copy-button', {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [274] "    text: function(trigger) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [275] "      const codeEl = trigger.previousElementSibling.cloneNode(true);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [276] "      for (const childEl of codeEl.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [277] "        if (isCodeAnnotation(childEl)) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [278] "          childEl.remove();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [279] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [280] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [281] "      return codeEl.innerText;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [282] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [283] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [284] "  clipboard.on('success', function(e) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [285] "    // button target"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [286] "    const button = e.trigger;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [287] "    // don't keep focus"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [288] "    button.blur();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [289] "    // flash \"checked\""                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [290] "    button.classList.add('code-copy-button-checked');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [291] "    var currentTitle = button.getAttribute(\"title\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [292] "    button.setAttribute(\"title\", \"Copied!\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [293] "    let tooltip;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [294] "    if (window.bootstrap) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [295] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-toggle\", \"tooltip\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [296] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-placement\", \"left\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [297] "      button.setAttribute(\"data-bs-title\", \"Copied!\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [298] "      tooltip = new bootstrap.Tooltip(button, "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [299] "        { trigger: \"manual\", "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [300] "          customClass: \"code-copy-button-tooltip\","                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [301] "          offset: [0, -8]});"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [302] "      tooltip.show();    "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [303] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [304] "    setTimeout(function() {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [305] "      if (tooltip) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [306] "        tooltip.hide();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [307] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-title\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [308] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-toggle\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [309] "        button.removeAttribute(\"data-bs-placement\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [310] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [311] "      button.setAttribute(\"title\", currentTitle);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [312] "      button.classList.remove('code-copy-button-checked');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [313] "    }, 1000);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [314] "    // clear code selection"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [315] "    e.clearSelection();"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [316] "  });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [317] "  function tippyHover(el, contentFn, onTriggerFn, onUntriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [318] "    const config = {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [319] "      allowHTML: true,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [320] "      maxWidth: 500,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [321] "      delay: 100,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [322] "      arrow: false,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [323] "      appendTo: function(el) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [324] "          return el.parentElement;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [325] "      },"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [326] "      interactive: true,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [327] "      interactiveBorder: 10,"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [328] "      theme: 'quarto',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [329] "      placement: 'bottom-start',"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [330] "    };"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [331] "    if (contentFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [332] "      config.content = contentFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [333] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [334] "    if (onTriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [335] "      config.onTrigger = onTriggerFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [336] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [337] "    if (onUntriggerFn) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [338] "      config.onUntrigger = onUntriggerFn;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [339] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [340] "    window.tippy(el, config); "                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [341] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [342] "  const noterefs = window.document.querySelectorAll('a[role=\"doc-noteref\"]');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [343] "  for (var i=0; i<noterefs.length; i++) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [344] "    const ref = noterefs[i];"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [345] "    tippyHover(ref, function() {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [346] "      // use id or data attribute instead here"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [347] "      let href = ref.getAttribute('data-footnote-href') || ref.getAttribute('href');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [348] "      try { href = new URL(href).hash; } catch {}"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [349] "      const id = href.replace(/^#\\/?/, \"\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [350] "      const note = window.document.getElementById(id);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [351] "      return note.innerHTML;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [352] "    });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [353] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [354] "  const xrefs = window.document.querySelectorAll('a.quarto-xref');"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [355] "  const processXRef = (id, note) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [356] "    // Strip column container classes"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [357] "    const stripColumnClz = (el) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [358] "      el.classList.remove(\"page-full\", \"page-columns\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [359] "      if (el.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [360] "        for (const child of el.children) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
      [361] "          stripColumnClz(child);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [362] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [363] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [364] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [365] "    stripColumnClz(note)"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [366] "    if (id.startsWith('sec-')) {"

      [386] "  for (var i=0; i<xrefs.length; i++) {"

      [425] "      }"

      [427] "    });"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [428] "  }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [429] "      let selectedAnnoteEl;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [430] "      const selectorForAnnotation = ( cell, annotation) => {"

      [435] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [436] "      const selectCodeLines = (annoteEl) => {"

      [445] "        let top = null;"

      [448] "        if (lineIds.length > 0) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [449] "            //compute the position of the single el (top and bottom and make a div)"

      [461] "            let div = window.document.getElementById(\"code-annotation-line-highlight\");"

      [470] "            div.style.left = 0;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [471] "            let gutterDiv = window.document.getElementById(\"code-annotation-line-highlight-gutter\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [472] "            if (gutterDiv === null) {"

      [474] "              gutterDiv.setAttribute(\"id\", \"code-annotation-line-highlight-gutter\");"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [475] "              gutterDiv.style.position = 'absolute';"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
      [476] "              const codeCell = window.document.getElementById(targetCell);"

      [481] "            gutterDiv.style.height = height + 4 + \"px\";"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [482] "          }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [483] "          selectedAnnoteEl = annoteEl;"

      [487] "        const elementsIds = [\"code-annotation-line-highlight\", \"code-annotation-line-highlight-gutter\"];"

      [494] "        selectedAnnoteEl = undefined;"

      [496] "        // Handle positioning of the toggle"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [497] "    window.addEventListener("

      [505] "      }, 10)"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [506] "    );"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [507] "    function throttle(fn, ms) {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
      [508] "    let throttle = false;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [509] "    let timer;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
      [510] "      return (...args) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
      [511] "        if(!throttle) { // first call gets through"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           
      [512] "            fn.apply(this, args);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
      [513] "            throttle = true;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
      [514] "        } else { // all the others get throttled"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
      [515] "            if(timer) clearTimeout(timer); // cancel #2"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [516] "            timer = setTimeout(() => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
      [517] "              fn.apply(this, args);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [518] "              timer = throttle = false;"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [519] "            }, ms);"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          
      [520] "        }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
      [521] "      };"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     
      [522] "    }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
      [523] "      // Attach click handler to the DT"

      [542] "      }"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
      [543] "  const findCites = (el) => {"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
      [544] "    const parentEl = el.parentElement;"

      [581] "</script>"
